com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.adapter

Class CloudPageListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.adapter.CloudPageListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter

    public abstract class CloudPageListAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
implements ListAdapter
    CloudPageListAdapter can be used to create an "inbox" view of CloudPage messages that have been retrieved from the servers.
